title: Column icons are not displayed when connecting to a Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in a project and creating a dataset, the column icons are not visible in the Data Set window.
OB: When setting up a Data Source to connect to a Derby database and creating a dataset in the Edit Data Set window, the column icons are missing.
EB: When setting up a Data Source to connect to a Derby database and creating a dataset in the Edit Data Set window, the column icons should be visible.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details:
   Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   User Name: root
   Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6. Observe that the column icons are not displayed.
